name: EWQ
description: EWQ is an ecological governance token developed by EXPANDING THE WORLD, integrated throughout the entire ETW gaming ecosystem. It functions as both the token reward within ETW and the ETW Chain's public blockchain token. EWQ features a wide array of application scenarios and a well-rounded ecological layout. The value generated by the ETW ecosystem's development will be integrated into EWQ. Players can earn corresponding EWQ rewards, based on the system's evaluation of their activity index, through in-game gold farming. Additionally, EWQ can be obtained via friend sharing and ecosystem circulation.
